publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-391 Bill Wilson: Co-operatives UKâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Co-operatives UK, the union of co-operative enterprises, on the publication of its Co-operative Review 2007; notes the breadth of co-operative enterprises within the British Isles and the value of their contribution to social and economic wellbeing, and calls on the Scottish Executive to do what it can to support the growth of such businesses. Supported by: Brian Adam*
S3M-391 Co-operatives UK (lodged on 27 August 2007) Hugh Henry*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-391 Co-operatives UK (lodged on 27 August 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-391 Co-operatives UK (lodged on 27 August 2007) Sandra White*
